column1: > 12:00|"Shortly after noon"|"Shortly after noon they had found it a long sprawl of waggons and horses
column5: it stretched across the floor of a shallow valley. And surrounding it on all sides was the squalid and motley beggar army of King Urish of Nadsokor."|"The Vanishing Tower"|"Michael Moorcock"

column3: his legs buckled and he fell sprawling in the sand and lay there while the remains of his sensibilities left him."|"The Vanishing Tower"|"Michael Moorcock"
